name: The Kissu Lip Mask
about: What it is: A luscious jelly lip mask that works all day or overnight to plump, hydrate, and smooth, restoring fullness and softness to dry, flaky lips...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Gel..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Japanese Peach Extract: Helps to repair damaged lips, revitalize, and calm irritation..- Three Rose Extract: Protects from dryness and visibly smoothens for healthier lips..- Japanese Camellia Oil (Tsubaki): Seals in moisture and nurtures with of vitamins A, B, D, and E and nourishing omegas 3, 6, and 9u2014this featherweight botanical oil is richer in oleic acid than olive oil...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know:  Mask treatments made from fresh fruits and botanicals have been beloved in Japan for generations. Japanese women traditionally chopped peach seeds and mixed them with oils to help repair dry, flaky lips. This time-tested secret inspired The Kissu Lip Mask...Consumer Results: Based on an independent clinical study of 40 women:.After one night:.-95% agreed lips felt soothed, soft, and supple.-92% agreed lips felt deeply moisturized.-100% showed improvement in lip plumpness..After one week:.-92% agreed lips felt deeply repaired.-90% agreed lips felt firmer + looked pillowy.-100% experienced an improvement in the overall condition of the lips..After two weeks:.-100% experienced an improvement in texture of lips.-92% experienced an improvement in dryness + flakiness...
ingredients: -Japanese Peach Extract: Helps to repair damaged lips, revitalize, and calm irritation..-Three Rose Extract: Protects from dryness and visibly smoothens for healthier lips..-Japanese Camellia Oil (Tsubaki): Seals in moisture and nurtures with of vitamins A, B, D, and E and nourishing omegas 3, 6, and 9u2014this featherweight botanical oil is richer in oleic acid than olive oil....Triisostearin, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Squalane, Sucrose Hexaisostearate, Dextrin Palmitate, Aluminum Distearate, Dextrin Palmitate/Ethylhexanoate, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Prunus Persica (Peach) Kernel Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Water, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit/(Rosa Centifolia/Rosa Damascena) Flower Extract, Lithospermum Officinale Root Extract, Saccharomyces/Camellia Sinensis Leaf/Cladosiphon Okamuranus/Rice Ferment Filtrate*, Allantoin, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Tocopherol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Pyridoxine Hcl, Aqua/Water/Eau, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum/Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Lauroyl Lysine, Aluminum Hydroxide, Silica....*Hadasei-3.......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For overnight use as a lip mask, apply in generous layers. ..-For daytime use, apply a thin layer to moisturize or prep lips for color. ..-Add a small dab over lip color for a glossy finish.

reviews.review_text: Better than Laneige's ever so popular 'Lip Sleeping mask', which I was a long time fan of, until this came along. reviews.review_text: I've never used a lip mask before so nothing to compare to but this is such a gamechanger for my chapped lips! I have a really bad habit of licking and chewing my lips that I've suffered so long from dry, chapped, peeling lips that drugstore balms alone can't keep hydrated. After using this mask for one night, I woke up with my lips looking instantly repaired like they've never been dry or damaged a day in their life! This mask has really fixed my previously neglected lips and works so quick to fix them right up again when I find myself falling back into my habit of licking/chewing my lips. I only use this at night before bed because I find it too sticky to wear while I go about my day. The mask lasts me all night and I usually find I wake up with product still on my lips, which makes for a slightly sticky mess when I wash my face and brush my teeth in the morning, but even wiping this off my lips leaves them so visibly smooth I gasp each time. This is honestly a miracle product for me and my lips! I've never had a holy grail product before but this is definitely it - no question!!!

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. All the other Tatcha products Iu2019ve tried have been excellent but I justu2026donu2019t get this. Itu2019s sticky as heck, doesnu2019t last, doesnu2019t really moisturize my lips and itu2019s expensive. Vaseline does a better job.

I actually tried this product in the new limited edition red camellia version. The color is more of a red-ish tint which I loved because, call me crazy, but I am someone who hates when my lips look pale and colorless when I am doing my skincare routine and getting ready for bed lol. Anyway my lips were on a bit of a dry patch due to the cold climate where I live and this mask fixed that right up. I woke up with perfectly smooth lips. It was a dream! I am always looking for good lip masks that work, and this one definitely does. I enjoyed it so much that I am thinking of purchasing the regular pink color as well.

reviews.review_text: I did Like the appearance on the lips but it is very thick and has a sticky feel, my lips dry out over time though so it doesnu2019t have a lasting effect, although my mom loves it and says it leaves her lips very moisturized, it may preform different in different lips?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this was just going to be a fun purchase to spoil myself, but I've been using this for two weeks and my lips are noticeably more full and healthy. I've noticed they also hold more colour now when I apply tinted lip balm throughout the day. I'm 31 and my lips just aren't as plump as they used to be, but this mask really brought more life into them lol. Definitely a new necessity in my night time routine!
A little bit of product goes a long way. I love a good lip mask I use it every night before bed and it has saved my dry chapped lips. :)

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine :)
reviews.review_text: I looove this lip mask, i have them in both, the original and the red one, it has helped me during the 2 weeks it got sooo dry outside & inside (during winter ofc). I always use it when Iu2019m ready for bed, also when I wake up in the mornings getting ready for work, just to get it ready for the day ud83dude0a  I know it isnu2019t for everyone that already tried or it may not be for you, but you wonu2019t find a lip mask that you like if you donu2019t try any of them.

This lip mask saved my lips! As someone who gets dry cracked lips in the winter this mask has hydrated and made my lips so soft and got rid of the soar cracked spots! This product is worth every cent it costs! Iu2019ve tried everything on my lips and this has been the best product Iu2019ve ever used!

It is sad to say, but this product was not my first choice to choose for lip masks. I wanted to buy the Laneige lip mask, but they were sold out everywhere, so I read reviews on this and got it. Safe to say, I am pleased with this lip mask.   It works so well and keeps my lips nice and smooth. I apply some on before I go to bed and even when I wake up, the application is still there. I definitely would recommend this to anyone who wants to try a new lip mask besides the Laneige one. I am almost out of this product too and I plan to buy another one!
I have tried multiple lip masksu2026.This is by far my FAVORITE. It literally is still on my lips in the morning. So so soft.
Love this lip mask. Happy I finally got to get it!!! Makes my lips feel like satin. Definitely will buy again when need be!!!
The winter air has made my lips unbearably dry. This mask healed them over night! Best used after exfoliating!

reviews.review_text: After trying the popular Laneige lip sleeping mask and being disappointed by it, I was hesitant to try an even more expensive product but this is worth it! I do think the price is too high for the amount of product you get, but I'll see how long one container lasts and if it's worth the long term investment.
this is my favorite lip balm. it feels so nice and looks glossy and has a nice subtle scent. i have already had 2 and will buy another one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for a few months, I notice no difference in the moisture or feel of my dry lips. Aquaphor, Vaseline, or Glossier's Balm Dot Com work way better. Also I don't know why a mask has to have color! If anything my lips feel MORE dry after use. It's pretty as lipstick/gloss, but not a mask and not helpful for dry lips.

Itu2019s thick in consistency and stays on the lips wonderfully. A little goes along way with this mask. Definitely will hydrate dry crusty lips.
